Dialog_Description_CritError: An unknown error has occured, please join the Discord server for help at [server]
Download_Failure: An error occured when trying to download this item. Try disabling any VPNs or firewalls.
Download_FailureCritical: An error occured when trying to download this item. Try disabling any VPNs or firewalls. Installation cannot continue.
Download_FailureChecksum: An error occured when trying to download this item. Try downloading again, if it fails again, we probably messed something up. Installation cannot continue.
EULA_Licenses:
Follows are licenses for libraries used by this installer, Amethyst and device plugins.

You must accept the Kinect for Windows related EULAs to continue with installation.
EULA_Warranty: By continuing with installation, you agree that this software, and every component bundled or installed by it are provided "as-is" and come with no warranty whatsoever. The developers and maintainers of each respective component, library, or software are not responsible for any claims, damages or liability.
InstallDestination_AmeInstallFound: This folder already contains an installation of Amethyst, it will be overwritten.
InstallDestination_AmethystInstallLocati: Only Amethyst will be installed to this folder. Other items will be installed to their default locations.

InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.InstallDestination_InvalidPathDescriptio: The path you've entered is invalid. Please enter a valid path.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.InstallDestination_PathPlaceholder: Please select a valid install folder
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.InstallOptions_ClickToViewSummary: Click an item to see details.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.InstallError_CloudPC: Cloud PC detected. Amethyst does not support remote or "cloud" PCs.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.InstallError_SteamVRNotFound: Couldn't find SteamVR! Is it installed, and have you run it at least once?
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.InstallError_WindowsVersionIsOld: Windows version is too old to run Amethyst. Please update Windows from the Settings app before using Amethyst.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.DeviceInfo_XboxOneKinectLighthouseIncomp: Base station tracked devices will not work when an Xbox One Kinect is turned on. They interpret it as an invalid base station, and will stop tracking entirely.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.DeviceInfo_PsmoveEyeLibusbWarning: PlayStation Eye cameras are using LibUSB drivers! They won't be usable with PSMoveServiceEx unless you change the driver.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.DeviceInfo_PsmoveEyeLibusbWarningOverwri: PlayStation Eye cameras are using LibUSB drivers! These will be overwritten.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.InstallFailure_Modal_Description: An unexpected error occured while installing {0}. Please view the logs for more information. Join our Discord server for help. The installation cannot continue.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.InstallFailure_DiskFull_Description: One of your disk drives is full. Please clear some storage, then re-run this installer. The installation cannot continue.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.InstallProhibited_CloudPC: Cloud PCs are unsupported. Amethyst does not work on remote PCs.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.InstallProhibited_WindowsAncient: Your version of Windows is too old to work with Amethyst. Please update to a more recent version of Windows, 20H2 or newer, to install Amethyst.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.InstallProhibited_PhoneVR: Amethyst does not work with Phone-based VR such as Trinus or VRidge. If you intend on using Amethyst for Quest standalone tracking, or if you believe this check was done in error, you may simply click OK.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.InstallProhibited_DiskFull: Your Windows drive is full! Please clear some storage (at least 10GB), and re-run Amethyst Installer.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.Logs_DirectoryIsLocatedHere: The log file is stored here:
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.Speedrunner_Description:
Whoa there! Are you trying to get the world record on Amethyst Installer Any% ?

Be careful where you click!
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.AmethystMode_Description:
What will you use Amethyst for?
This can be changed later in Amethyst's Settings!
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.AmethystMode_OpenVR_Description:
Use this option if the application(s) you will be using runs on the same PC as Amethyst.

Requires SteamVR to be installed.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.AmethystMode_OSC_Description:
Use this option when playing VRChat directly on the Meta Quest, and not this computer.

OSC trackers is only supported in VRChat.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.KinectModule_WIX_Summary: An intermediary tool required to install the Kinect for Windows SDK v1.8.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.KinectModule_WIX_Description: An intermediary tool required to install the Kinect for Windows SDK v1.8.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.KinectModule_KinectV1_Summary: SDK and runtime for Xbox 360 Kinect and Kinect for Windows V1.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.KinectModule_KinectV1_Description: SDK and runtime for Xbox 360 Kinect and Kinect for Windows V1. This is required to use those devices with Amethyst.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.KinectModule_KinectV1Toolkit_Title: Kinect for Windows Developer Toolkit v1.8
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.KinectModule_KinectV1Toolkit_Summary: Developer Samples for Xbox 360 Kinect and Kinect for Windows V1.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.KinectModule_KinectV1Toolkit_Description: Developer Samples for Xbox 360 Kinect and Kinect for Windows V1. Contains useful tools like Kinect Explorer that can help diagnose issues with your Kinect.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.PsmoveModule_PSMS_Summary: PSMoveService is a third-party application that adds support for PS Move controllers and optionally to track them using PS Eye cameras.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.PsmoveModule_PSMS_Description:
PSMoveService is a third-party application that adds support for PS Move controllers and optionally to track them using PS Eye cameras.

PSMoveServiceEx is a modern fork that fixes many bugs, adds new features and more.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.PsmoveModule_PSMS_VDM_Summary: PSMoveService is a third-party application that adds support for PS Move controllers and optionally to track them using PS Eye cameras.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.PsmoveModule_PSMS_VDM_Description:
PSMoveService is a third-party application that adds support for PS Move controllers and optionally to track them using PS Eye cameras.

PSMoveServiceEx is a modern fork that fixes many bugs, adds new features and more.

VDM (Virtual Device Manager) is an additional tool that works alongside PSMSEX to provide support for additional interfaces and devices.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.PsmoveModule_PSMS_Drivers_Summary: Installs the drivers for PlayStation Eye devices. Recommended if using PSMoveServiceEx.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.PsmoveModule_PSMS_Drivers_Description: Installs the drivers for PlayStation Eye devices. Recommended if using PSMoveServiceEx.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.SystemRequirement_Description_Playspace_:
Your VR play area is large enough for tracking.
{0}m by {1}m

The size of your VR play area could cause issues with tracking. [Refer to the documentation for physical space requirements.]
{0}m by {1}m
Your play area size could not be detected. [Refer to the documentation for physical space requirements.]
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.SystemRequirement_Description_Storage: {0} of disk space based on the components selected.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.SystemRequirement_Description_UsbControl: Laptop detected! If needed, you won't be able to add new USB controllers.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.SystemRequirement_Footnote_StageTracking: We recommend [enabling stage tracking] inside the Quest portion of Virtual Desktop to avoid needing to recalibrate Amethyst at the start of each VR session.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.Welcome_Footnote: If you run into bugs, please contact us on our %s% for help.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.Done_LaunchDesktop:
You can find Amethyst on the desktop.
As shown on the left.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.Done_LaunchStartMenu:
You can find Amethyst on the Start menu.
As shown on the left.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.PostOp_Kinect_EnableMic_Description: Please enable the Kinect microphone. It is required for the Kinect for Windows SDK to function properly.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.MustDisableMemoryIntegrity_Description: The Kinect for Windows drivers do not support Memory Integrity. Please disable Memory Integrity to be able to use your Kinect.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.Updating_FailedReachApi: Failed to connect to K2VR Web API. Please check your internet connection, and re-run the updater.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.Installer_QuitVerify_Modal_Title:
If you exit now, Amethyst will not be installed.
Are you sure you want to close the installer?
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.Installer_K2EXUpgrade_Title: You're about to upgrade to Amethyst
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.Installer_K2EXUpgrade_Description: Amethyst is a new app from K2VR Team. It replaces K2EX. It's faster, more stable and has a bunch of new features.
InstallDestination_DiskLabelFormat.Uninstall_Success: It's sad to see you go. We wish you luck in your future VR adventures!
